${ModID}:OverheadSmash.NAME: Overhead Smash
${ModID}:OverheadSmash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if last card played was an *Attack. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

${ModID}:DodgeSlash.NAME: Dodge Slash
${ModID}:DodgeSlash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your current Block exceeds enemy's intended damage, gain [E].
${ModID}:DodgeSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your current Block exceeds enemy's intended damage, gain [E] [E].

${ModID}:KinsectHarvestExtract.NAME: Kinsect Harvest Extract
${ModID}:KinsectHarvestExtract.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 random Extract you don't have. NL At start of turn, return to hand from Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:KinsectHarvestExtract.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Gain 1 random Extract you don't have. NL At start of turn, return to hand from Exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Vault.NAME: Vault
${ModID}:Vault.DESCRIPTION: At the start of next turn, draw !M! cards.

${ModID}:JumpingAdvancingSlash.NAME: Jumping Advancing Slash
${ModID}:JumpingAdvancingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! cards. NL ${ModID}:Aerial: Add a *Dance to your hand.

${ModID}:RisingSpiralSlash.NAME: Rising Spiral Slash
${ModID}:RisingSpiralSlash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played with 3 different Extracts. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 5 times. NL Draw 5 cards. NL Randomly lose !M! Extracts.

${ModID}:Mounting.NAME: Mounting
${ModID}:Mounting.DESCRIPTION: When attacking while Aerial, gain 1 *Mount. NL When *Mount reaches 10, lose this power and ALL enemies lose 50% of current HP.
